resources.string:
Next bugfix release:
 · Fix: Text selection from cache description no longer working on some devices
 · Fix: Translation menu sometimes missing after selecting text
 · Fix: Found status of webcam caches not shown
 · Fix: Avatar not shown on login check if it was not a jpeg
 · Fix: Own coords not updated in waypoint screen
 
 
 2016.03.06:
 · New: Select parts of the cache description text for sharing
 · New: Invite friends to use c:geo directly from the app
 · New: Use https for communication with Geokrety
 · New: Support links encoded in some GeoKrety QRCode
 · New: Filter for caches found last 30 days
 · New: Support GeoLutins trackables
 · New: Allow to change header coords locally for Letterbox and Wherigo caches
 · New: Show generation date and remaining days for pocket queries
 · Change: Encrypted log entries are shown encrypted initially
 · Fix: Waypoints imported correctly for GPX from geocheck.org
 · Fix: Hide export menu if list does not contain exportable caches
 · Fix: Hide showcase for hint in compass if no hint is available for that cache
 · Fix: Inconsistency in descriptions of user created waypoints
 · Fix: Don't show unknown attribute icons for opencaching.org.uk
 · Fix: Import pocket queries from bookmark lists with umlauts
 · Fix: Show progress indication on logging page while information is loaded in the background
 · Fix: Allow searching for trackable secret codes starting with GC
 · Fix: Do not leave the app when selecting back in spoiler view
 · Fix: Hint picture not refreshed when switching to different cache
 · Fix: Implemented workaround to show horizontal lines from HTML
 · Fix: List of PQ also shown if none of them is downloadable
 · Fix: Caches with final waypoints predefined (e.g. challenges) will have final marker on map
 · Fix: Correct error message if basic member tries to open PM-only cache
 · Fix: Nearby result can not be sorted by "Hidden date"
